results.deck: In The Groove 2 is the second iteration of a dance/rhythm series made by Roxor. It's extremely similar to Konami's Dance Dance Revolution and is the center of a massive gaming community for it's ability to play custom songs.

results.deck: The fifth game in the core Guitar Hero franchise, and the third in the series from Activision and Neversoft.  Though the game goes by the Guitar Hero moniker, it features full-band gameplay like its predecessor, Guitar Hero World Tour.

results.deck: An open-world crime game, developed by Edge of Reality, that would have starred Snoop Dogg as a thug living in South Central L.A. The game was cancelled on March 1, 2006.
results.name: Fear & Respect

results.deck:
Coraline: The Game is based on Neil Gaiman’s international best-selling Hugo Award-winning book, and Focus Features’ film.  

Coraline will allow players to explore and interact with such immersive 3-D environments from the movie as the Pink Palace , its nooks and crannies and apartments, and the unpredictable Other World.
results.name: Coraline: The Game

results.deck: A dating simulation game for the PS2. It has been adapted to different media such as manga, light novels and an anime called KimiKiss Pure Rouge.
results.name: KimiKiss

results.deck: Return to The Show with Sony's latest and greatest entry in its long-running baseball series. Nothing gets you closer.

results.deck: A game based on the monkey that is a wee bit curious.

results.deck: A remake of the first Monster Hunter, it added new monsters, items, and online play. It was released only in Japan. A PSP port of this remake was released to the west as Monster Hunter Freedom.
results.name: Monster Hunter G

results.deck: A dating simulation / strategy game for the PS2 and PCs. There are additional games, an anime and manga and they all follow the Angel Troupe in their adventures.

results.deck: A dating simulation / strategy game for the PS2 and PCs, and is the sequel to the game Galaxy Angel. It introduces a new character to the Angel Troupe: Karasuma Chitose.

results.deck: A dating simulation / strategy game for the PS2 and PCs, and is the sequel to the game Galaxy Angel Moonlit Lovers.
results.name: Galaxy Angel: Eternal Lovers

results.deck: LucasArts' first failed attempt at a sequel to the successful 1995 adventure game, Full Throttle. Headed by industry veterans Bill Tiller and Larry Ahern, Payback was canceled early in the conceptual stage.
results.name: Full Throttle: Payback

results.deck: Madden 10 propels us into the next decade with procedural awareness.  Madden 10 introduces a physics based player interaction engine known as Pro-Tak that features gang tackles, improved OL/DL play, and WR/DB interactions.

results.deck: Based on the Fate/Stay Night visual novel/anime series from Type-Moon. The PSP version is based on the arcade/PS2 version, with various enhancements like simplified controls, balance adjustments, new Reflect Dash move, new costumes and ad-hoc versus mode.

results.deck: The 2009 edition of Konami's major league baseball franchise.

results.deck: A music based game only released in Japan.

results.deck: School Days is a popular Dating Sim game for the PC with an all ages version for the PS2. Its story was adapted into a 12 episode Anime, 2 OVAs, a 2 Tankoban Manga, 6 Novels and a Radio Drama series.

results.deck: A game featuring Bratz and diamondz.
results.name: Bratz: Forever Diamondz

results.deck: Take trucks to the tundra as MotorStorm debuts on the PSP and PS2.

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 is the latest edition of the perennial golf series, brought to you by EA Sports and EA Tiburon. The Wii version can be played with the Motion Plus adapter, while the 360 and PS3 versions utilize analog sticks for club control.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10

results.deck: Truck Racer is racing gameabout muscle power versus smaller more nimble utilitarian vehicles. Develoved by Brain in a Jar for the Wii, PC and PS2.
results.name: Truck Racer

results.deck: CID is a crash test dummy, take part in his adventures across wacky platforming stages to save a damsel in distress.

results.deck: The sequel to the BIGS aims to further refine the arcade feel of the original.
results.name: The BIGS 2

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is a compilation of some of the most popular songs from previous titles. This time, all songs are master recordings, and there is full band support for each track.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits

results.deck: The third band-specific Guitar Hero offering from Activision, Guitar Hero: Van Halen allows you to play as the rock legends themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Van Halen
